verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> Now after מ֣וֹת <WH4194> the death יְהוֹשֻׁ֔עַ <WH3091> of Joshua וַֽיִּשְׁאֲלוּ֙ <WH7592> asked בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> it came to pass that the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מִ֣י <WH4310> Who יַעֲלֶה־ <WH5927> Who shall go up לָּ֧נוּ אֶל־ <WH413> against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> for us against the Canaanites בַּתְּחִלָּ֖ה <WH8462> first לְהִלָּ֥חֶם <WH3898> to fight בּֽוֹ׃

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> And the LORD יְהוּדָ֣ה <WH3063> Judah יַעֲלֶ֑ה <WH5927> shall go up הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> behold נָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> behold I have delivered אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> the land בְּיָדֽוֹ׃ <WH3027> into his hand

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said יְהוּדָה֩ <WH3063> And Judah לְשִׁמְע֨וֹן <WH8095> unto Simeon אָחִ֜יו <WH251> his brother עֲלֵ֧ה <WH5927> Come up אִתִּ֣י <WH854> into בְגוֹרָלִ֗י <WH1486> with me into my lot וְנִֽלָּחֲמָה֙ <WH3898> that we may fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> against the Canaanites וְהָלַכְתִּ֧י <WH1980> and I likewise will go גַם־ <WH1571> turn אֲנִ֛י <WH589> I אִתְּךָ֖ <WH854> for בְּגוֹרָלֶ֑ךָ <WH1486> with thee into thy lot וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> went אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> So שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> So Simeon

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> went up יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> And Judah וַיִּתֵּ֧ן <WH5414> delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> הַכְּנַעֲנִ֥י <WH3669> the Canaanites וְהַפְּרִזִּ֖י <WH6522> and the Perizzites בְּיָדָ֑ם <WH3027> into their hand וַיַּכּ֣וּם <WH5221> and they slew בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> of them in Bezek עֲשֶׂ֥רֶת <WH6235> ten אֲלָפִ֖ים <WH505> thousand אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> men

וַֽ֠יִּמְצְאוּ <WH4672> And they found אֶת־ <WH853> אֲדֹנִ֥י בֶ֙זֶק֙ <WH137> Adonibezek בְּבֶ֔זֶק <WH966> in Bezek וַיִּֽלָּחֲמ֖וּ <WH3898> and they fought בּ֑וֹ וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> against him and they slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַפְּרִזִּֽי׃ <WH6522> and the Perizzites

וַיָּ֙נָס֙ <WH5127> fled אֲדֹ֣נִי בֶ֔זֶק <WH137> But Adonibezek וַֽיִּרְדְּפ֖וּ <WH7291> and they pursued אַחֲרָ֑יו <WH310> after וַיֹּאחֲז֣וּ <WH270> him and caught אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> וַֽיְקַצְּצ֔וּ <WH7112> him and cut off אֶת־ <WH853> בְּהֹנ֥וֹת <WH931> his thumbs יָדָ֖יו <WH3027> and his great וְרַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> and his great toes

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said אֲדֹֽנִי־ בֶ֗זֶק <WH137> And Adonibezek שִׁבְעִ֣ים ׀ <WH7657> Threescore and ten מְלָכִ֡ים <WH4428> kings בְּֽהֹנוֹת֩ <WH931> their thumbs יְדֵיהֶ֨ם <WH3027> and their great וְרַגְלֵיהֶ֜ם <WH7272> and their great toes מְקֻצָּצִ֗ים <WH7112> cut off הָי֤וּ <WH1961> become מְלַקְּטִים֙ <WH3950> gathered תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> up under שֻׁלְחָנִ֔י <WH7979> [their meat] under my table כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> I עָשִׂ֔יתִי <WH6213> as I have done כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> so שִׁלַּם־ <WH7999> hath requited לִ֖י אֱלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> so God וַיְבִיאֻ֥הוּ <WH935> me And they brought יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> him to Jerusalem וַיָּ֥מָת <WH4191> and there he died שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there פ

וַיִּלָּחֲמ֤וּ <WH3898> had fought בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> Now the children יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> of Judah בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וַיִּלְכְּד֣וּ <WH3920> and had taken אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וַיַּכּ֖וּהָ <WH5221> it and smitten לְפִי־ <WH6310> it with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city שִׁלְּח֥וּ <WH7971> and set בָאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> on fire

וְאַחַ֗ר <WH310> And afterward יָֽרְדוּ֙ <WH3381> went down בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <WH3898> to fight בַּֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑י <WH3669> against the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelt הָהָ֔ר <WH2022> in the mountain וְהַנֶּ֖גֶב <WH5045> and in the south וְהַשְּׁפֵלָֽה׃ <WH8219> and in the valley

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> And Judah אֶל־ <WH413> against הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> against the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּחֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> in Hebron וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> (now the name חֶבְר֥וֹן <WH2275> of Hebron לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> before קִרְיַ֣ת אַרְבַּ֑ע <WH7153> Kirjath-arba וַיַּכּ֛וּ <WH5221> beat אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁשַׁ֥י <WH8344> Sheshai וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִימַ֖ן <WH289> and Ahiman וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּלְמָֽי׃ <WH8526> and Talmai

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶל־ <WH413> against יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> against the inhabitants דְּבִ֑יר <WH1688> of Debir וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> and the name דְּבִ֥יר <WH1688> of Debir לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> before קִרְיַת־ סֵֽפֶר׃ <WH7158> [was] Kirjathsepher

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said כָּלֵ֔ב <WH3612> And Caleb אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יַכֶּ֥ה <WH5221> He that smiteth אֶת־ <WH853> קִרְיַת־ סֵ֖פֶר <WH7158> Kirjathsepher וּלְכָדָ֑הּ <WH3920> and taketh וְנָתַ֥תִּי <WH5414> it to him will I give ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> Achsah בִתִּ֖י <WH1323> my daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַֽיִּלְכְּדָהּ֙ <WH3920> took עָתְנִיאֵ֣ל <WH6274> And Othniel בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son קְנַ֔ז <WH7073> of Kenaz אֲחִ֥י <WH251> brother כָלֵ֖ב <WH3612> Caleb's הַקָּטֹ֣ן <WH6996> younger מִמֶּ֑נּוּ <WH4480> at וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> it and he gave ל֛וֹ אֶת־ <WH853> עַכְסָ֥ה <WH5915> him Achsah בִתּ֖וֹ <WH1323> his daughter לְאִשָּֽׁה׃ <WH802> to wife

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came בְּבוֹאָ֗הּ <WH935> And it came to pass when she came וַתְּסִיתֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH5496> [to him] that she moved לִשְׁא֤וֹל <WH7592> him to ask מֵֽאֵת־ <WH853> אָבִ֙יהָ֙ <WH1> of her father הַשָּׂדֶ֔ה <WH7704> a field וַתִּצְנַ֖ח <WH6795> and she lighted מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from הַחֲמ֑וֹר <WH2543> from off [her] ass וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said לָ֥הּ כָּלֵ֖ב <WH3612> and Caleb מַה־ <WH4100> to her What לָּֽךְ׃

וַתֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> And she said ל֜וֹ הָֽבָה־ <WH3051> unto him Give לִּ֣י בְרָכָ֗ה <WH1293> me a blessing כִּ֣י <WH3588> since אֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> land הַנֶּ֙גֶב֙ <WH5045> me a south נְתַתָּ֔נִי <WH5414> for thou hast given וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> give לִ֖י גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> me also springs מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of water וַיִּתֶּן־ <WH5414> gave לָ֣הּ כָּלֵ֗ב <WH3612> And Caleb אֵ֚ת <WH853> גֻּלֹּ֣ת <WH1543> springs עִלִּ֔ית <WH5942> her the upper וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> גֻּלֹּ֥ת <WH1543> springs תַּחְתִּֽית׃ <WH8482> and the nether פ

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children קֵינִי֩ <WH7017> of the Kenite חֹתֵ֨ן <WH2859> father in law מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> Moses' עָל֨וּ <WH5927> went up מֵעִ֤יר <WH5892> out of the city הַתְּמָרִים֙ <WH8558> of palms אֶת־ <WH854> among בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> with the children יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah מִדְבַּ֣ר <WH4057> into the wilderness יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בְּנֶ֣גֶב <WH5045> which [lieth] in the south עֲרָ֑ד <WH6166> of Arad וַיֵּ֖לֶךְ <WH1980> went וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> and dwelt אֶת־ <WH854> with הָעָֽם׃ <WH5971> the people

וַיֵּ֤לֶךְ <WH1980> went יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> And Judah אֶת־ <WH854> with שִׁמְע֣וֹן <WH8095> with Simeon אָחִ֔יו <WH251> his brother וַיַּכּ֕וּ <WH5221> and they slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites יוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that inhabited צְפַ֑ת <WH6857> Zephath וַיַּחֲרִ֣ימוּ <WH2763> and utterly destroyed אוֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> וַיִּקְרָ֥א <WH7121> was called אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁם־ <WH8034> it And the name הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> of the city חָרְמָֽה׃ <WH2767> Hormah

וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> took יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Also Judah אֶת־ <WH853> עַזָּ֣ה <WH5804> Gaza וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלָ֔הּ <WH1366> with the coast וְאֶֽת־ <WH853> אַשְׁקְל֖וֹן <WH831> thereof and Askelon וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלָ֑הּ <WH1366> with the coast וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֶקְר֖וֹן <WH6138> thereof and Ekron וְאֶת־ <WH853> גְּבוּלָֽהּ׃ <WH1366> with the coast

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> And the LORD אֶת־ <WH854> was with יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> was with Judah וַיֹּ֖רֶשׁ <WH3423> and he drave out אֶת־ <WH853> הָהָ֑ר <WH2022> [the inhabitants of] the mountain כִּ֣י <WH3588> because לֹ֤א <WH3808> but could not לְהוֹרִישׁ֙ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָעֵ֔מֶק <WH6010> of the valley כִּי־ <WH3588> because רֶ֥כֶב <WH7393> because they had chariots בַּרְזֶ֖ל <WH1270> of iron לָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> And they gave לְכָלֵב֙ <WH3612> unto Caleb אֶת־ <WH853> חֶבְר֔וֹן <WH2275> Hebron כַּֽאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֣ר <WH1696> said מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> as Moses וַיּ֣וֹרֶשׁ <WH3423> and he expelled מִשָּׁ֔ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁלֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> thence the three בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> sons הָעֲנָֽק׃ <WH6061> of Anak

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> the Jebusites יֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that inhabited יְרֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> Jerusalem לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֖ישׁוּ <WH3423> did not drive out בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the children בִנְיָמִ֑ן <WH1144> of Benjamin וַיֵּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> dwell הַיְבוּסִ֜י <WH2983> but the Jebusites אֶת־ <WH854> with בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> with the children בִנְיָמִן֙ <WH1144> of Benjamin בִּיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> in Jerusalem עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this ס

וַיַּעֲל֧וּ <WH5927> they also went up בֵית־ <WH1004> And the house יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> of Joseph גַּם־ <WH1571> again הֵ֖ם <WH1992> like בֵּֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> against Bethel וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD עִמָּֽם׃ <WH5973> with

וַיָּתִ֥ירוּ <WH8446> sent to descry בֵית־ <WH1004> And the house יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> of Joseph בְּבֵֽית־ אֵ֑ל <WH1008> Bethel וְשֵׁם־ <WH8034> (Now the name הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> of the city לְפָנִ֖ים <WH6440> before לֽוּז׃ <WH3870> Luz

וַיִּרְאוּ֙ <WH7200> saw הַשֹּׁ֣מְרִ֔ים <WH8104> And the spies אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> a man יוֹצֵ֣א <WH3318> come forth מִן־ <WH4480> out הָעִ֑יר <WH5892> out of the city וַיֹּ֣אמְרוּ <WH559> and they said ל֗וֹ הַרְאֵ֤נוּ <WH7200> unto him Shew נָא֙ <WH4994> Please אֶת־ <WH853> מְב֣וֹא <WH3996> us we pray thee the entrance הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וְעָשִׂ֥ינוּ <WH6213> and we will shew עִמְּךָ֖ <WH5973> you חָֽסֶד׃ <WH2617> thee mercy

וַיַּרְאֵם֙ <WH7200> And when he shewed אֶת־ <WH853> מְב֣וֹא <WH3996> them the entrance הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> into the city וַיַּכּ֥וּ <WH5221> they smote אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> the man וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all מִשְׁפַּחְתּ֖וֹ <WH4940> and all his family שִׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7971> but they let go

וַיֵּ֣לֶךְ <WH1980> went הָאִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> into the land הַחִתִּ֑ים <WH2850> of the Hittites וַיִּ֣בֶן <WH1129> and built עִ֗יר <WH5892> a city וַיִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and called שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> the name ל֔וּז <WH3870> thereof Luz ה֣וּא <WH1931> which שְׁמָ֔הּ <WH8034> which [is] the name עַ֖ד <WH5704> against הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> thereof unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this פ

וְלֹא־ <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> drive out מְנַשֶּׁ֗ה <WH4519> Neither did Manasseh אֶת־ <WH853> בֵּית־ שְׁאָ֣ן <WH1052> [the inhabitants of] Bethshean וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶיהָ֮ <WH1323> and her towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> תַּעְנַ֣ךְ <WH8590> nor Taanach וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֶיהָ֒ <WH1323> and her towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> [יֹשֵׁב כ] (יֹשְׁבֵ֨י <WH3427> the inhabitants ק) ד֜וֹר <WH1756> of Dor וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶ֗יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> nor the inhabitants יִבְלְעָם֙ <WH2991> of Ibleam וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֹתֶ֔יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֥י <WH3427> nor the inhabitants מְגִדּ֖וֹ <WH4023> of Megiddo וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנוֹתֶ֑יהָ <WH1323> and her towns וַיּ֙וֹאֶל֙ <WH2974> would הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֔י <WH3669> but the Canaanites לָשֶׁ֖בֶת <WH3427> nor the inhabitants בָּאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> in that land הַזֹּֽאת׃ <WH2063> It

וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> when חָזַ֣ק <WH2388> was strong יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> And it came to pass when Israel וַיָּ֥שֶׂם <WH7760> that they put אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites לָמַ֑ס <WH4522> to tribute וְהוֹרֵ֖ישׁ <WH3423> and did not utterly לֹ֥א <WH3808> out הוֹרִישֽׁוֹ׃ <WH3423> drive them out ס

וְאֶפְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH669> Neither did Ephraim לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֔ישׁ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites הַיּוֹשֵׁ֣ב <WH3427> that dwelt בְּגָ֑זֶר <WH1507> in Gezer וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֛י <WH3669> but the Canaanites בְּקִרְבּ֖וֹ <WH7130> among בְּגָֽזֶר׃ <WH1507> in Gezer פ

זְבוּלֻ֗ן <WH2074> Neither did Zebulun לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִישׁ֙ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants קִטְר֔וֹן <WH7003> of Kitron וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> nor the inhabitants נַהֲלֹ֑ל <WH5096> of Nahalol וַיֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> but the Canaanites בְּקִרְבּ֔וֹ <WH7130> among וַיִּֽהְי֖וּ <WH1961> and became לָמַֽס׃ <WH4522> them and became tributaries ס

אָשֵׁ֗ר <WH836> Neither did Asher לֹ֤א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִישׁ֙ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants עַכּ֔וֹ <WH5910> of Accho וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> nor the inhabitants צִיד֑וֹן <WH6721> of Zidon וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַחְלָ֤ב <WH303> nor of Ahlab וְאֶת־ <WH853> אַכְזִיב֙ <WH392> nor of Achzib וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֶלְבָּ֔ה <WH2462> nor of Helbah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲפִ֖יק <WH663> nor of Aphik וְאֶת־ <WH853> רְחֹֽב׃ <WH7340> nor of Rehob

וַיֵּ֙שֶׁב֙ <WH3427> dwelt הָאָ֣שֵׁרִ֔י <WH843> But the Asherites בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> among הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land כִּ֖י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not הוֹרִישֽׁוֹ׃ <WH3423> for they did not drive them out ס

נַפְתָּלִ֗י <WH5321> Neither did Naphtali לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not הוֹרִ֞ישׁ <WH3423> drive out אֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> the inhabitants בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh וְאֶת־ <WH853> יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> nor the inhabitants בֵית־ עֲנָ֔ת <WH1043> of Bethanath וַיֵּ֕שֶׁב <WH3427> but he dwelt בְּקֶ֥רֶב <WH7130> among הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֖י <WH3669> the Canaanites יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> the inhabitants הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְיֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> nevertheless the inhabitants בֵֽית־ שֶׁ֙מֶשׁ֙ <WH1053> of Bethshemesh וּבֵ֣ית עֲנָ֔ת <WH1043> and of Bethanath הָי֥וּ <WH1961> became לָהֶ֖ם לָמַֽס׃ <WH4522> became tributaries ס

וַיִּלְחֲצ֧וּ <WH3905> forced הָאֱמֹרִ֛י <WH567> And the Amorites אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> the children דָ֖ן <WH1835> of Dan הָהָ֑רָה <WH2022> into the mountain כִּי־ <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not נְתָנ֖וֹ <WH5414> for they would not suffer לָרֶ֥דֶת <WH3381> them to come down לָעֵֽמֶק׃ <WH6010> to the valley

וַיּ֤וֹאֶל <WH2974> would הָֽאֱמֹרִי֙ <WH567> But the Amorites לָשֶׁ֣בֶת <WH3427> dwell בְּהַר־ <WH2022> in mount חֶ֔רֶס <WH2776> Heres בְּאַיָּל֖וֹן <WH357> in Aijalon וּבְשַֽׁעַלְבִ֑ים <WH8169> and in Shaalbim וַתִּכְבַּד֙ <WH3513> prevailed יַ֣ד <WH3027> yet the hand בֵּית־ <WH1004> of the house יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> of Joseph וַיִּהְי֖וּ <WH1961> became לָמַֽס׃ <WH4522> so that they became tributaries
וּגְבוּל֙ <WH1366> And the coast הָאֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> of the Amorites מִֽמַּעֲלֵ֖ה עַקְרַבִּ֑ים <WH4610> to Akrabbim מֵהַסֶּ֖לַע <WH5553> from the rock וָמָֽעְלָה׃ <WH4605> and upward פ
